professional.title: Professional Development
professional.description: The department of education and professional development in rehabilitation, physiotherapy, and therapeutic massage - this is a collaboration with Israeli specialists and training centers, such as the Medical Massage College, founded and directed by Dr. Aaron Yakobi.

marketplace.description: We are developing the marketplace direction. Our partners in this direction can be rehabilitation centers, clinics, sanatoriums, sports clubs, massage …

exercise_complexes.title: Exercise Complexes
exercise_complexes.description: The rehabilitation section provides exercise complexes in the following areas: orthopedics, neurology, obesity, rehabilitation for the elderly, post-COVID-19 rehabilitation, gait rehabilitation, aphasia, and dysarthria. All exercise complexes are developed by Israeli specialists in accordance with Israeli rehabilitation protocols.

for_children.title: For Children
for_children.description: Children aged 10 and above and teenagers will find relevant sections related to posture, juvenile scoliosis and thoracic spine, as well as shoulder girdle problems, lower limb issues, and correction.

articles.title: Articles
articles.description: Our library features articles that serve as theoretical introductions to each area of Rehabilitation and cover possible problems and pathologies, anatomy, physiology, and biomechanics.
